content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created and I received a command to list files in the current directory. I executed the command and returned a list of files in the directory, including various code files and text files.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "brno_reservoir_trip/brno_reservoir_trail_info.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Distance: 5.4 miles\nDuration: 2 hours and 14 minutes\nElevation gain: 285 feet\n', type='action_result')]
"""
